snippet.title: Stray Souls - Official Release Window and Composer Announce Trailer | ID@Xbox Showcase
snippet.description:
Explore the terrifying world of Stray Souls when the third-person action-horror game from developer Jukai Studio launches in fall 2023. The latest trailer for Stray Souls showcases new gameplay, including some of the dangerous enemies you'll be up against. The trailer also reveals that Akira Yamaoka, who worked on Silent Hill, Shadows of the Damned, and The Medium, will be a new guest composer.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
